MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 and EH46 postcode areas of Penicuik and West Linton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.27pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault found on our overhead cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:58PM on Sunday 27 December 2020.
